effect.x_y: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Fails if not used on a sleeping Pokémon. Inflicts regular damage. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

short_effect.x_y: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Only works on sleeping Pokémon. Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

flavor_text.x_y: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.
